LinesAnswers.name: initialNoMoney
LinesAnswers.line: Hello, boy, you look frail somehow. A good person should be a lot, haha. I would share pies with you, but my pockets are empty, and I still have a couple of days to go home. Eh, there, at home, my mother will feed me. Her borscht is much better than food at 5-star restaurants. Do you know why? For vegetables, soil is the most important thing, the earth, but not the atmosphere and all sorts of other ephemeral gizmos.

responses.response: You are saying interesting things, but I have to go.

LinesAnswers.name: initialHasMoney
LinesAnswers.line: Hello, boy, you look frail somehow. A good person should be a lot, haha. I would share pies with you, but my pockets are empty, and I still have a couple of days to go home. Eh, there, at home, my mother will feed me. Her borscht is much better than food at 5-star restaurants. Do you know why? For vegetables, soil is the most important thing, the earth, but not the atmosphere and all sorts of other ephemeral gizmos.

responses.response: I have some money, let me buy pies.
You are saying interesting things, but I have to go.

LinesAnswers.name: cardsManCought
LinesAnswers.line: Did you see how that crook was taken out? Did you crack him?! Well done, boy. Since this is the case, I will share the pies with you, but first guess the riddle. My uncle spent half of his life in places not as remote as this gambler will be soon apparently. Therefore I know some kind of riddles. Tell me what kind of bars won't keep a prisoner in jail?

responses.response: I need a bit of time.

LinesAnswers.name: 1stRiddleSolved
LinesAnswers.line: You are right, here - take the pies.

LinesAnswers.name: 1stRiddleLost
LinesAnswers.line: You've got it wrong, the answer was: chocolate bars. All right, I'll give you another riddle. What can you share only once?

responses.response: I need a bit of time.

LinesAnswers.name: 2ndRiddleSolved
LinesAnswers.line: You are right, here - take the pies.

LinesAnswers.name: hint
LinesAnswers.line: Well, let's do it again! I'll give you a hint, there's a proverb: Don't let the cat out of the bag. What can you share only once?

responses.response: I need a bit of time.

LinesAnswers.name: boughtPirogiOrSharedWithYoy
LinesAnswers.line: SIMON:'Looks like I don't have any other topic to discuss with him. I'll leave him like that.'
